scripts.build-style: cleancss -o public/build/theme.min.css public/assets/platform/css/theme.min.css public/assets/platform/css/theme.rtl.min.css &&  cleancss -o public/build/main.min.css public/assets/fontiran.css public/assets/platform/libs/slick-carousel/slick/slick.css public/assets/platform/libs/slick-carousel/slick/slick-theme.css public/assets/platform/libs/tiny-slider/dist/tiny-slider.css public/assets/platform/libs/bootstrap-icons/font/bootstrap-icons.min.css public/assets/platform/libs/feather-webfont/dist/feather-icons.css public/assets/platform/libs/simplebar/dist/simplebar.min.css public/assets/platform/css/order.css
scripts.build-script: terser public/assets/platform/js/jalaali.min.js public/assets/platform/js/vendors/validation.js public/assets/platform/js/lazyload.min.js public/assets/platform/libs/bootstrap/dist/js/bootstrap.bundle.min.js public/assets/platform/libs/simplebar/dist/simplebar.min.js public/assets/platform/libs/rater-js/index.js public/assets/platform/js/vendors/jquery.min.js public/assets/platform/js/vendors/countdown.js public/assets/platform/libs/slick-carousel/slick/slick.min.js public/assets/platform/js/vendors/slick-slider.js public/assets/platform/libs/tiny-slider/dist/min/tiny-slider.js public/assets/platform/js/vendors/tns-slider.js public/assets/platform/js/vendors/zoom.js public/assets/platform/js/theme.min.js public/assets/platform/js/main.min.js -o public/build/main.min.js -c -m
scripts.build-asset: npm run build-style && npm run build-script
